Social Marketing Evidence Base

Tuberculosis: Studies Reporting Behaviors Outcomes

The impact of media-based health education on tuberculosis diagnosis in Cali, Colombia

Jaramillo E

Health Policy Plan, 2001, 16(1): 68-73 | http://heapol.oxfordjournals.org/content/16/1/68.long
Location Population Design Sampling Method SOE Score Social Marketing Benchmark Criteria
Columbia General public Quasi-experimental Probability 4 6: Theory, Behavior, Customer orientation, Insight, Segmentation, Methods mix

Intervention Description

Television and radio spots and public service announcements

Outcomes

Behaviors
Number of direct smears and number of people tested
Health
Number of new cases of positive pulmonary TB
